You know what you make a good point, it's hilarious that everyone is insisting we get URF and OFA  when all those are is Summoner Rift Maps with the same Champions usually picked or banned every time

Meanwhile poro King and Ascension both are unique Maps, unique gameplay modes, and have a variety of in-and-out meta Champions based on each patch. I actually can't wait to try new urgot in poro king sometime that's going to be fun, and kayn in ascension is going to be nuts.

Not to mention almost every other game mode besides those two takes place on an alternate map or a very very modified Rift that is practically a new map. With this realization in my opinion people who only like URF/OFA are some of the most important people in this game.

> almost every other game mode besides those two takes place on an alternate map or a very very modified Rift that is practically a new map

Shall we review Riot's game modes?

----------------

SR Clone (lets change one or two things!):

- Black Market Brawlers
- Doom Bots
- Nemesis Draft
- One for All
- U.R.F.
- Snowdown Showdown
- SR Hexakill

Pseudo- SR clone (Amplifies some part of SR game-play):

- ARAM (mid only)
- Murder Bridge (Re-skinned ARAM)
- Poro King (Modified mid only)
- Nexus Siege (End game + toys)

Similar (but not SR):

- Twisted Treeline
- Hexakill Twisted Treeline
- ~~Magma Chamber~~ (Canceled)

Significantly different:

- Dark Star
- ~~Dominion~~ (Canceled)
- Ascension
- Blood Moon
- ~~Bad joke Salting the wound they made~~ Defiantly not Dominion

---------------------------

I'm not going to rag on Riot for picking low-hanging fruit. It's a ***LOT*** easier to change one or two things on an existing platform than it is to create an entirely new one.  And the vocal community appears to request those clones more than anything else. But make no mistake: they've tweaked SR more times than they haven't.

I'll likely not bother playing it even once just to be honest. Just like I don't bother playing Ascension or Poro King anymore. 

The "Crazy Thresh Mode" was really amusing like 6 times, silliness. Then it was REALLY boring and samey, and there was nothing interesting cause it was the exactly same game play over and over with no change in anything.

I've always hated poro king. It is lazy. It is literally just aram but with the poro king, which isn't interesting at all.  Ascension WAS amusing, but the more they iterated on it the less I liked it. Now I not only don't like it, I am far beyond bored with it.
don't forget that unlike other game modes, Poro King has been released EVERY YEAR since it was created...
